actions.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.2150.

official_title: To clear certain impediments to the licensing of the vessel PLAY PRETTY for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.

titles.title: To clear certain impediments to the licensing of the vessel PLAY PRETTY for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.
